      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean controllerButtonClicked(int button, int controller) 
      static boolean controllerButtonDown(int button, int controller)
      Returns Whether or not the button on controller is down; null if controllers have not been initialized.
      static boolean controllerButtonUp(int button, int controller)
      Returns Whether or not the button on controller is up; null if controllers have not been initialized.
      static int getControllerCount()
      Returns The amount of controllers.
      static Vector2f getDPad(int controller)
      Returns A vector containing the x and y value of the d-pad.
      static Vector2f getGlobalMousePosition()
      Returns The global mouse position based on the displacement of the game's camera and the scaling of the graphics.
      static float getGlobalMouseX()
      Returns The global mouse x position based on the displacement of the game's camera and the scaling of the graphics.
      static float getGlobalMouseY()
      Returns The global mouse y position based on the displacement of the game's camera and the scaling of the graphics.
      static Vector2f getLeftAnalogStick(int controller)
      Returns A vector containing the x and y value of the left analog stick.
      Mapper getMapper()
      Returns the current input mapper.
      static Vector2f getMousePosition()
      Returns The mouse 'correct' position (Has to do with the opengl origin being bottom left, and ours being top left).
      static int getMouseX()
      Returns The mouse position's 'correct' x (Has to do with the opengl origin being bottom left, and ours being top left).
      static int getMouseY()
      Returns The mouse position's 'correct' y (Has to do with the opengl origin being bottom left, and ours being top left).
      static char getNextCharacter()
      Returns The last character pressed.
      static Vector2f getRightAnalogStick(int controller)
      Returns A vector containing the x and y value of the right analog stick.
      static void init()
      Creates the input things.
      static void initControllers() 
      static boolean keyClicked(int key)
      Returns If key was clicked.
      static boolean keyDown(int key)
      Returns If key is down.
      static boolean keyUp(int key)
      Returns If key is up.
      static boolean mouseClicked(int mouseButton)
      Returns If mouse button was clicked.
      static boolean mouseDown(int mouseButton)
      Returns If mouse button is down.
      static boolean mouseUp(int mouseButton)
      Returns If mouse button is up.
      static boolean mouseWheelDown()
      Returns If mouse wheel is going down.
      static boolean mouseWheelUp()
      Returns If mouse wheel is going up.
      static void poll()
      Polls keyboard and mouse.
      static void pollControllers()
      Updates a list of things that happened every frame.
      static void pollKeyboard()
      Updates a list of things that happened every frame.
      static void pollMouse()
      Updates a list of things that happened every frame.
      static void purgeBuffers() 
      static void setControllerPollingEnabled(boolean controller)
      Enables event polling.
      static void setKeyboardPollingEnabled(boolean keyboard)
      Enables event polling.
      static void setMapper(Mapper mapper)
      Sets the input mapper.
      static void setMousePollingEnabled(boolean mouse)
      Enables event polling.
      static void setPollingEnabled(boolean keyboard, boolean mouse, boolean controller)
      Enables event polling.
      static void setRepeatEventsEnabled(boolean repeatEvents)
      Sets whether or not to accept repeating events.
      static boolean wasControllerPressed()
      Returns If any button was pressed.
      static boolean wasKeyClicked()
      Returns If any key was clicked.
      static boolean wasMouseClicked()
      Returns If any button was clicked.

        Sets whether or not to accept repeating events.

      • mouseClicked

        public static boolean mouseClicked(int mouseButton)
        Returns If mouse button was clicked.

      • mouseDown

        public static boolean mouseDown(int mouseButton)
        Returns If mouse button is down.

      • mouseUp

        public static boolean mouseUp(int mouseButton)
        Returns If mouse button is up.

      • wasMouseClicked

        public static boolean wasMouseClicked()
        Returns If any button was clicked.

      • mouseWheelUp

        public static boolean mouseWheelUp()
        Returns If mouse wheel is going up.

      • mouseWheelDown

        public static boolean mouseWheelDown()
        Returns If mouse wheel is going down.

      • getMousePosition

        public static Vector2f getMousePosition()
        Returns The mouse 'correct' position (Has to do with the opengl origin being bottom left, and ours being top left).

      • getMouseX

        public static int getMouseX()
        Returns The mouse position's 'correct' x (Has to do with the opengl origin being bottom left, and ours being top left).

      • getMouseY

        public static int getMouseY()
        Returns The mouse position's 'correct' y (Has to do with the opengl origin being bottom left, and ours being top left).

      • getGlobalMousePosition

        public static Vector2f getGlobalMousePosition()
        Returns The global mouse position based on the displacement of the game's camera and the scaling of the graphics.

      • getGlobalMouseX

        public static float getGlobalMouseX()
        Returns The global mouse x position based on the displacement of the game's camera and the scaling of the graphics.

      • getGlobalMouseY

        public static float getGlobalMouseY()
        Returns The global mouse y position based on the displacement of the game's camera and the scaling of the graphics.

      • initControllers

        public static void initControllers()

      • controllerButtonClicked

        public static boolean controllerButtonClicked(int button,
                              int controller)

      • controllerButtonDown

        public static boolean controllerButtonDown(int button,
                           int controller)
        Returns Whether or not the button on controller is down; null if controllers have not been initialized.

      • controllerButtonUp

        public static boolean controllerButtonUp(int button,
                         int controller)
        Returns Whether or not the button on controller is up; null if controllers have not been initialized.

      • wasControllerPressed

        public static boolean wasControllerPressed()
        Returns If any button was pressed.

      • getLeftAnalogStick

        public static Vector2f getLeftAnalogStick(int controller)
        Returns A vector containing the x and y value of the left analog stick. null if controllers have not been initialized.

      • getRightAnalogStick

        public static Vector2f getRightAnalogStick(int controller)
        Returns A vector containing the x and y value of the right analog stick. null if controllers have not been initialized.

      • getDPad

        public static Vector2f getDPad(int controller)
        Returns A vector containing the x and y value of the d-pad. null if controllers have not been initialized.

      • getControllerCount

        public static int getControllerCount()
        Returns The amount of controllers. -1 if controllers have not been initialized.

        Enables event polling.
        Parameters:
        keyboard - Enable keyboard polling?

        Enables event polling.

        controller - Enable controller polling?

      • setPollingEnabled

        public static void setPollingEnabled(boolean keyboard,
                     boolean mouse,
                     boolean controller)
        Enables event polling.
        Parameters:
        keyboard - Enable keyboard polling?
        mouse - Enable mouse polling?
        controller - Enable controller polling?
